issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description: On previous version of Ti Studio I used to use shortcut ⇧⌘F11 to run project ,but it doesn't work any more on "Studio" I have to switch to "Studio (extended)"
fields.summary: Studio: Shortcut Key for "run project" does not work in "Studio" perspective

comments.body:
Hello Matej,

I am seeing the same behavior in the release candidate of Ti Studio 3.2.0.201311262027.
However, I do not see  this with the latest release candidate Ti Studio 3.2.0.201312031529.

This may have been corrected.
Could you please try updating and verify if you still have the same issue?

In case you need the link, you can get the update from here: http://preview.appcelerator.com/studio/

Hi Eric,

Sorry I didn't noticed that there is newer version of Studio. I have updated and it does work. Thank you very much

Matej,

No worries. Things move quickly here and there is always another version in the works.
Glad we were able to get your issue resolved. I will close this ticket as fixed.
